abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column observes that Michael Muhammad Knight, Muslim convert known for satirizing his fellow believers, has written provocative book Why I Am a Five Percenter, which explores his affinity for the Nation of Gods and Earths, mysterious offshoot of the Nation of Islam.
snippet: Michael Muhammad Knight, a Muslim convert who satirizes fellow believers, has written a new book about his affinity for a mysterious offshoot of the Nation of Islam.
